vanilla = "0:255=0:255" //cancels others

Firedeath = "0:255=%[2.00,0.00,0.00]:[2.00,1.81,0.00]"
GreenFiredeath = "0:255=%[0.00,0.43,0.08]:[0.31,2.00,0.36]"
BrightRed = "0:255=%[1.91,0.00,0.00]:[2.00,0.58,0.58]"

//fully blackened
Scorched = "0:255=%[0.00,0.00,0.00]:[0.33,0.33,0.33]"

//black-grey with red blood
BloodyScorched = " 0:4=5:8","9:12=105:111","13:15=105:111","16:31=105:111","48:63=105:111","64:79=5:8","80:95=105:111","96:104=5:8","112:120=105:111","121:127=5:8","128:143=105:111","144:151=5:8","152:159=105:111","160:163=105:111","164:167=5:8","168:175=105:111","169:175=185:191","192:198=105:111","199:207=5:8","208:215=105:111","206:223=5:8","224:231=105:111","232:235=5:8","236:239=5:8","240:247=5:8","248:249=105:111","250:254=105:111","255:255=105:111"

//same but more redness is blackened
DarkBloodyScorched = "0:4=5:8","9:12=105:111","13:15=105:111","32:47=5:8","16:31=105:111","48:63=105:111","64:79=5:8","80:95=105:111","96:104=5:8","112:120=105:111","121:127=5:8","128:143=105:111","144:151=5:8","152:159=105:111","160:163=105:111","164:167=5:8","168:168=5:5","169:175=185:191","192:198=105:111","199:207=5:8","208:215=105:111","206:223=5:8","224:231=105:111","232:235=5:8","236:239=5:8","240:247=5:8","248:249=105:111","250:254=105:111","255:255=105:111"

//black-grey with blue blood (for Cacos)
BlueBloodyScorched = "0:4=5:8","9:12=105:111","13:15=105:111","16:31=105:111","32:47=105:111","48:63=105:111","64:79=5:8","80:95=105:111","96:104=5:8","112:120=105:111","121:127=5:8","128:143=105:111","144:151=5:8","152:159=105:111","160:163=105:111","164:167=5:8","168:168=5:8","169:175=105:111","176:191=5:8","208:215=105:111","206:223=5:8","224:231=105:111","232:235=5:8","236:239=5:8","240:247=5:8","248:249=105:111","250:254=105:111","255:255=105:111"

//black-grey with green blood (for Bruisers)

//Cacpdemon fleshy-colored gibs
CacoGibs = "0:4=48:79","5:8=48:79","9:12=48:79","13:15=48:79","16:47=48:79","48:79=48:79","80:111=48:79","112:127=48:79","128:151=48:79","152:159=48:79","160:167=48:79","168:191=48:79","208:223=48:79","224:231=48:79","232:235=48:79","236:239=48:79","248:249=48:79","250:254=48:79","255:255=48:79"


//red to blue
BlueBlood = "16:47=194:207", "168:191=196:207", "232:235=240:246"
//red to green
GreenBlood = "16:47=112:127", "168:191=115:127", "232:235=152:159"

//green to blue
BluePlasma = "9:12=242:245", "112:127=192:207","152:159=200:207"
//blue to green
GreenPlasma = "192:207=112:127", "240:247=122:127"
//blue to yellow
YellowPlasma = "192:207 = 224:231", "240:247 = 232:235"

//debris 
DebrisStone 	= "0:255 = 105:111" //dark-grey
DebrisWood 		= "0:255 = 73:79" //brown
DebrisMarble1 	= "0:255 = 152:159" //pale green
DebrisMarble2 	= "0:255 = 96:105" //medium grey
DebrisBrick 	= "0:255 = 236:239" //dark brown
